ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Goblin Alchemist
ygData.msgSnippet: Goblin sentries spawn regularly there, along with lookouts and veterans. I d also heard that nothing was also a placeholder for him. ... them. ... had ...
ygData.messageBody:
Goblin sentries spawn regularly there, along with lookouts and veterans.

I'd also heard that "nothing" was also a placeholder for him.

> From: David Frascone <chaos@...>
>
>
> There's another strange goblin spawn that is his place holder. It's not
> one of the normal three, he is just near him. I forgot it's name, but
> I think it's Goblin Sentry or somethign like that.
>
> On Tue, Mar 21, 2000 at 03:15:06PM -0600, RaceFace wrote:
> > From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
> >
> > I don't think he has placeholders.
> >
> > I think there's a 4th spawn point.
> >
> > When I arrived in the zone, all 3 of the spawn points had goblins at
them.
> > I didn't kill any, went to the bathroom, came back, and the alchemist
had
> > just started walking away from his spawn point. Unless one of them
> > despawned, and the alchemist appeared, there's a 4th, separate spawn for
> > him.
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: "Currey, Mick" <mick_currey@...>
> > To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
> > Sent: March 21, 2000 11:37
> > Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Goblin Alchemist
> >
> >
> > > From: "Currey, Mick" <mick_currey@...>
> > >
> > > I hunted mino's in the gorge for a week hoping to run into the
alchemist
> > > while there. No such luck.
> > >
> > > What I was told when trying to learn more about him, was that the
> > > placeholders spawn every 70 minutes. As you come out of RE into the
> > gorge,
> > > there are three gobbies that spawn. The two on the right are supposed
to
> > be
> > > the place holders.
> > >
> > > Some people have told me they just find the spawn cycle time, then
leave
> > and
> > > return right before the next set spawns. I always ck when I run thru
the
> > > gorge. Maybe someday I'll get lucky and run into it.
> > >
> > > The gobbies there are pretty low level, low teens I think. I would
guess
> > > the alchy will be in the high teens or very low twenties.
> > >
> > >
> > > Good luck,
> > >
> > > Thors Blazingfury, Tunare
> > >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Nick Gee [mailto:nick_gee@...]
> > > Sent: Tuesday, March 21, 2000 11:31 AM
> > > To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> > > Subject: [EQ-Monks] Goblin Alchemist
> > >
> > > From: "Nick Gee" <nick_gee@...>
> > >
> > > Ok I think it's about time for me to hunt the goblin
> > > alchemistr in
> > > beholder and do the treant fists quest. ANY information on
> > > the quest
> > > at all, spawn rates, lvl's what they drop and where as well
> > > as
> > > anything you think would help me is much appreciated, thanks
> > > alot.
> > >
> > > Aedir Swiftstriker
> > >
> > >
> > >
> >
